title: Dad Rides a Motorcycle in Another World~ Let’s Visit My Reincarnated Wife With My Daughter~ - Novel Updates
tags: Cheats   Family   Female Protagonist   Magic   Multiple Transported Individuals   Transported to Another World
author: Satou   さとう
description:
My father is a boring office worker.

He lost my mother when I was young and raised me single-handedly.

But, I know. Ever since mother passed away, his heart has been silently crying out.

Ten years after my mother passed away, I was 16 and my father was 38.

And today, my father and I died in a car accident.

But, my father and I… are still alive. 

We got transferred to another world and received a choice for a cheat ability from God… But, what my father asked from God was a motorcycle. 

Instead of being a 'Great Mage' like me, he wanted to ride a motorcycle through the prairie that spreads across the other world with me. 

But, I was really surprised.

My mother, my father’s wife, was reincarnated and has been living in this world ever since she died in Japan.

This is a trip to find the reincarnated wife of a widowed father who lost his wife and cannot recover, and the daughter who grew up watching such a father.
>
